thread.title: Football Wildcats pick up sixth commitment for 2017
thread.title_full: Football Wildcats pick up sixth commitment for 2017

title: Football Wildcats pick up sixth commitment for 2017
text:
Football Wildcats pick up sixth commitment for 2017 Updated: Thu 2:36 PM, Oct 22, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) – Charles Reeves, Jr., a tight end from Steubenville, OH, has committed to Mark Stoops and the Wildcats. 
Reeves, Jr., who is 6-foot-5, 240-lbs., is rated a four-star receiver by Scout.com, becomes UK’s sixth commitment in the Class of 2017. 
Scout.com ranks Reeve, Jr. the No. 6 tight end in the Class of 2017. 
Reeves, Jr. also has offers from Wisconsin, Michigan and others. 
Reeves, Jr. joins running back Michael Warren, defensive end James Hudson, receiver Russ Yeast, along with quarterbacks Mac Jones and Walker Wood in the Class of 2017.
